mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password_hash, nickname, role, points) VALUES (#{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{nickname}, #{role}, #{points})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, email, password_hash, nickname, role, total_xp, points, created_at, updated_at FROM users ORDER BY points DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM users u2 WHERE u2.points > u1.points) as `rank`, u1.nickname, u1.points, u1.total_xp as totalXp FROM users u1 WHERE u1.user_id = #{userId}
